description: Documentation page explaining computed properties in a JavaScript component framework, including concepts, defining computed properties, reactivity, and usage examples.

classes.name: Blits.Component
classes.description: Factory function for creating component definitions, supporting configuration including computed properties.

methods.name: offset
methods.description: A computed property function that calculates an offset based on the component's index.

methods.name: bgColor
methods.description: A computed property function that determines background color based on focus state.
